title: English Translation Hadith of Sahih Bukhari and Muslim: English - Arabic
description: Generally regarded as the single most authentic collection of Ahadith, Sahih Al-Bukhari and Muslim covers almost all aspects of life in providing proper guidance from the messenger of Allah. Tremendous amounts of errors exist in the translations by other translators. Presented a book which is translated into English in a very easy and simple language, so that all readers can understand it without difficulty.This 9-Volume Bukhari is the work of over 16 years by Imam Bukhari who before writing any Hadith in this book performed two Rakat prayer of guidance from Allah and when he was sure of the Hadith's authenticity, he wrote it in the book. And then This 7-Volume Muslim.This is the unabridged version consisting of 7563 ahadith (about 4000 pages). Each book (subtopics in each volume categorized by very broad topics such as the Book of As-Salat) contains many chapters which represent one logical unit of Ahadith. Each book contains anywhere from one to 150 chapters with each chapter containing several Ahadith. This book will be a great addition to your library while giving you a true perspective on the traditions of the Prophet (PBUH).Sahih Muslim is the most authentic book of Hadith after Sahih Al-Bukhari and contains 7,563 Ahadith. The Muslim Scholars have agreed that all of the Ahadith in Sahih Muslim are authentic. Thus, Darussalam realized the great benefit of publishing the full version of Sahih Muslim in the English language in the best presentation. Much care has been taken in rendering these Ahadith into a clear and simple style of modern English.
author: محمد بن إسماعيل البخاري
